nodes.text: Sector Four, or Sector 4, was a location in the Hoth system of the Anoat sector. During the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the Imperial Death Squadron arrived above the planet Hoth in Sector 4. In 34 ABY, The Rebel Files were uncovered on Durkteel and eventually reached General Leia Organa of the Resistance. On a document relating to the Battle of Hoth, Organa wrote an annotation about when Imperial forces arrived in Sector 4.
